segments.text: I need a phone card for this new cell phone .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Cool phone . What kind of phone card do you want ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's for my daughter who is still a senior high school student .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then the M-Zone will be suitable .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know students use tested message service . And they provide favorable service for that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's nice . And I need a pre-paid phone card .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , there is a sales promotion for it now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , good . Then what is it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you buy a pre-paid phone card worth 100 yuan today , you will get 50 yuan for free .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I have two of them ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . As many as you want .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , then a third one for my husband too .
segments.speaker: S2
